snippet.title: Unity of Command II - TGS Live Stream Replay
snippet.description:
Replay of the TGS stream, aired live on Sep 12, 2019 on Steam: http://bit.ly/UoC2Steam

Scenario designer Daniel Mellbin (2x2 Games), and PR dude Ante Vrdelja (Croteam) take you through the initial three scenarios of the Allied campaign. This is WORK IN PROGRESS footage, but really it's close enough. The game is due for release in Fall 2019. Enjoy!

Unity of Command II is the sequel to one of the most critically acclaimed strategy games of all time; a game critics called 'the perfect gateway' into computer war games.
